t: Amazon Launches Its First B2B Private Label Brand
s: July 30, 2019 - AmazonCommercial is the first private label foray into a rapidly expanding B2B customer base. In spite of anti-trust scrutiny, Amazon is not slowing down its private- and exclusive-brand rollouts. Here's what national brands should know about Amazon's strategy.
